title: You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
body:
This is going to be the death of me playing this game. 
So, right before I enter the loading screen, I get "You have disconnected. Please check your internet connection again. I do not understand why this happens as my internet connection is always fine.
I keep trying to reconnect, but it keeps doing it. 
Peer to Peer does not work at all.
Shouldn't riot be researching how to fix this before even making this garbage new client?
This is going to make players get banned for something that is not even their fault, but the client's fault.
This is making me so angry!

replies.body: I had the exact same problem, and I created a board about it. I have leaverbuster now because of my computer that rarely lags and like never crashes.

It really sucks that you keep getting that disconnection error on the loading screen, and the main problem is most likely somewhere in your own pc as opposed to the servers since the other players were able to enter that game just fine. More than likely, your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with the specific game server you were going to be playing on. Check out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if you're still having this issue.

Are you sure?

I get the same error message, while, those using the same internet connection do not while playing LoL.

Check out some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and let me know if you're still having this issue.

My network settings are perfectly fine. I get 33 ping almost every game. I've only started to get this issue when the client was updated.
Yeah a client update screwed up my game as well with the same issue. I've been unable to play for a month because of this same issue. So annoyed.
